name: Never Forget
description:
#BoğaziçiGamejam22

Theme: Password

Objective: Find all the clues to help you remember the password before you die.

Controls:

Movement: Arrow keys

Dash: C

Skip dialog: X

Assets:

Music: Joshua McLean - Mountain Trials 

Font: Press Start 2P Font by codeman38 https://www.fontspace.com/press-start-2p-font-f11591

Footsteps sfx: https://freesound.org/people/Wdomino/sounds/517136/

All the other sound effects are created in Bfxr

Developer: Erkin Fırtına

Discord: Erkin#9863
